author: bhagwan parab
title: Congress sounds poll bugle at Nagpur rally
text: Kharge warns democracy will be finished if BJP, RSS not stopped Mumbai: Sounding the bugle for the 2024 general election, senior Congress leader Rahul Gandhi on Thursday said that the coming polls will be a â€œbattle of two ideologiesâ€ as â€œslaveryâ€ works in the BJP. He also promised a nationwide caste census if the Congress was voted to power at the Centre. Addressing a â€œHai Taiyyar Humâ€ rally in Nagpur that kickstarted the Congressâ€™ campaign for next yearâ€™s Lok Sabha polls, Mr Gandhi lashed out at the ruling BJP, saying the saffron party is run on an authoritarian ideology like that of erstwhile kings. â€œThere is a fight of ideologies going on in the country. Their (BJP) ideology is the ideology of kings. They donâ€™t listen to anyone, orders just come from above. Whereas in the Congress, the voices come from below, our small workers can point out the big leaders. I listen to our workers and also respect their voice (concerns),â€ Mr Gandhi said. The freedom struggle was not fought by the kings or rulers of that time, it was fought by the people of the country. Kings and rulers had a partnership with the British. The Congress fought against that partnership for the people of the country, he added. â€œVice-chancellors are appointed not on the basis of merit but because they belong to a particular organisation. Unemployment is highest now in the last 40 years,â€ Mr Gandhi stated. The Congress leader also announced that his party will undertake a caste census if voted to power at the Centre. â€œWe will undertake a caste census after coming to power at Centre, he said. After the Congress made a demand for a caste census, Prime Minister Narendra Modiâ€™s language changed and he started saying poverty was the only caste in the country. The Congress will carry out the caste census and give employment to youths, who are deprived of jobs, Mr Gandhi added. The Congress leader also said the BJP wants to take the country back to slavery, alleging that â€œghulamiâ€ (slavery) works in the saffron party. â€œA few days ago, I secretly met a BJP MP in the Lok Sabha, who was previously in the Congress. He spoke out of fear, and tension was visible on his face. He said: â€œBJP mein ghulami chalti haiâ€ (slavery works in the BJP), said the Congress leader. â€œThe BJP leader said that whatever directions are received from the authorities above have to be followed without thinking twice. No one listens to us, orders come from above. It is just like how kings used to give orders earlier and everyone had to follow it. There is no choice whether you like it or not,â€ Mr Gandhi said. Addressing the rally, Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge said the RSS and BJP have ruined the country in the last 10 years and if they are not stopped now, then democracy will be finished. The BJP made a mockery of democracy by suspending 146 Opposition MPs for asking questions and passing the bills in Parliament. The people should teach a lesson to Prime Minister Narendra Modi and the BJP for not respecting democracy, he added. While Congressâ€™ former president Sonia Gandhi and general secretary Priyanka Gandhi Vadra did not attend the rally, Telangana CM Revanth Reddy, Himachal Pradesh CM Sukhvinder Sukhu, Karnataka deputy CM D.K. Shivakumar, and former Maharashtra CMs Prithviraj Chavan, Sushilkumar Shinde and Ashok Chavan were present on the occasion.

author: Sponsored Content
title: Ranking the Top 3 Best Bee Pollen Supplement Brands to Try (2024)
text: Sponsored Content Bee pollen has been all over social media in the last year, with people claiming the benefits range from combatting menstrual and hormonal issues to increasing the size of â€œthe girls.â€ While thereâ€™s something to many bee pollenâ€™s benefits, the quality ranges wildly between products. Like many supplements that go through a boom period, there are a lot of poor-quality imitations on the market with next to no brand credibility or testing for purity, but that does have an excellent website. Fortunately, if youâ€™re wondering if bee pollen is for you, we have a list of the few companies that can be trusted to deliver the goods. Thus, you can get the health benefits of bee pollen without wasting your money on honey-colored sawdust. Itâ€™s also important to note that the compounds in bee pollen vary depending on the plant source and the season it was collected. For example, bee pollen collected from pine plants has approximately 7% protein, while pollen collected from date palm packs closer to 35% protein. The minerals and vitamins vary depending on the bee pollen as well. And, of course, people with a pollen allergy should avoid bee pollen. Different Forms of Bee Pollen There are essentially four different forms of bee pollen available: dried bee pollen, pollen in pill form, and then fresh and freeze-dried bee pollen, sometimes called bee pearl or bee bread, which are the ones you want. Freeze drying retains all nutrients, amino acids, and phytoestrogens and is much more easily stored; itâ€™s also often what people mean when talking about fresh bee pollen. Dried bee pollen (unless itâ€™s freeze-dried) is collected in its fresh form but undergoes a drying process that significantly reduces its nutrient values. Pollen in pill form is also dried and often contains more fillers than pollen, providing fewer health benefits. Itâ€™s also worth noting that royal jelly provides many benefits of bee pollen, so the best bee products contain a good amount. The Best Bee Pollen Supplements Below are our picks for [the best bee pollen supplements](https://becomingtrendy.com/best-bee-pollen-brand): - Kittie - Greenbow - Serenol Kittie â€“ The Best Bee Pollen Supplement Overall Technically, [Kittie](https://becomingtrendy.com/kittie-formula) has two products that contain Spanish bee pollen: their greens powder, which is an exciting product for women in general, but thatâ€™s not what weâ€™re focusing on, as this list is purely bee products. Kittie Bee Pearl contains the original royal jelly and beeswax, which are responsible for many benefits of bee pollen, especially for the immune system. Kittie does standardize for the flavonoids (the compounds that have any impact on health) such as quercetin, kaempferol, and apigenin, as well as the phenolic acids like ferulic acid and coumaric acid. This is the good stuff that makes bee pollen work. The other good thing about Kittie Bee Pearl is that itâ€™s dosed correctly, which aligns with the few studies on bee pollen. Maximize all potential health benefits with 2500mg of bee pollen and 500mg of royal jelly. This, in theory, covers everything from seasonal allergies and menstrual issues to antioxidants, heart and liver health, and even wound healing. - Pros - Reputable brand - Good dosage - Includes royal jelly, too Cons - Only available from their [website](https://becomingtrendy.com/kittie-formula) Greenbow â€“ Best Certified Organic Been Pollen While it is technically quite challenging to guarantee a bee pollen product is 100% organic (because bees collect pollen from all over the place, and they donâ€™t know if the flowers have been sprayed or not), Greenbow is as good as youâ€™re going to get on that front. Their price point is pretty good at $20, and the quality is solid; it doesnâ€™t have the royal jelly, but if youâ€™re looking for something decent from Amazon, Greenbow is the way to go. There are more than enough reviews to support Greenbow as a productâ€”it is good, straightforward bee pollen. Pros - Good price - Organic - Lots of reviews Cons - Could have royal jelly Serenol Serenol is a bee pollen-based PMS supplement that offers a natural solution to ease the symptoms of premenstrual syndrome. Utilizing bee pollenâ€™s properties, it aims to alleviate common issues associated with the menstrual cycle. Although its marketing is a bit overhyped, it works for some people. Although thereâ€™s more evidence that bee pollen can help menopause than PMS, it still suggests some hormonal benefits. Focusing on simplicity and effectiveness, Serenol addresses mood swings and emotional distress that often accompany PMS. Its formula taps into the natural benefits of bee pollen to provide relief without the need for artificial additives. Serenolâ€™s approach reflects a commitment to natural healing, providing a straightforward option for those seeking relief from hormonal fluctuations. Harnessing the power of bee pollen offers a pragmatic solution to the challenges of womanhood. If youâ€™re looking for a PMS supplement, we recommend Kittie. They offer a combined supplement of bee pollen and other ingredients for the same price. We know weâ€™re gushing about them, but we struggled to find three good brands for this list. Pros - Reputable brand Cons - Overpriced for what it is Choosing the Best Bee Pollen Supplement When selecting a bee pollen supplement, several factors should be considered to ensure you get a high-quality product that meets your needs. Here are the top considerations: Freshness and Source Freshness is crucial when it comes to bee pollen. Look for a reputable brand that keeps their bee pollen refrigerated or frozen during storage and transportation. Generally, Spanish bee pollen is considered the gold standard, although thatâ€™s not essential. Fresh bee pollen should dissolve into a powder when touched, while dried pollen will remain in its granular form with a rugged exterior shell. The freeze-dried powder is usually fine, but it must be frozen. Additionally, consider the source of the bee pollen. Opt for bee pollen sourced from reputable beekeepers prioritizing sustainable and ethical practices. Quality Control and Testing Choose a bee pollen supplement that undergoes rigorous quality control and testing processes. The manufacturer should test the pollen for purity, ensuring it is free from contaminants such as pesticides, heavy metals, and microbial pathogens. Look for supplements that have third-party certifications or adhere to industry standards to ensure the highest quality and safety. Storage and Packaging Proper storage and packaging are essential to maintain bee pollenâ€™s freshness and potency. Ensure the supplement is stored in a well-sealed container to prevent exposure to moisture and air. Some brands may also offer individually sealed packets for added convenience and freshness. Recommended Dosage Follow the manufacturerâ€™s recommended dosage instructions. Start with a small amount and gradually increase the dosage to assess your tolerance and response. Itâ€™s important not to exceed the recommended dosage to avoid potential adverse effects. Additional Ingredients Some bee pollen supplements may contain additional ingredients, such as vitamins, minerals, or other herbal extracts. Consider your specific health needs and preferences when choosing a supplement with extra ingredients. Read the product label carefully to ensure you know all the ingredients included. Bee Pollen FAQs Here are some common questions about bee pollen and their answers: Q: Can Bee Pollen Be Used as a Weight Loss Aid? A: Bee pollen has not been proven effective as a weight loss aid. While nutrient-dense and may support overall health, it should not be relied upon as a solution. A balanced diet and regular exercise are essential for sustainable weight management. Q: Is Bee Pollen Safe for Children? A: Bee pollen is not recommended for children under two due to the risk of allergic reactions. For older children, it is advisable to consult with a pediatrician before introducing bee pollen into their diet. Q: Can I Take Bee Pollen if I Am Pregnant or Breastfeeding? A: If pregnant or breastfeeding, consult a healthcare professional before taking bee pollen. While bee pollen is generally safe, individual circumstances may warrant caution. Q: Can I Take Bee Pollen if I Have Asthma or Allergies? A: Individuals with asthma or allergies to pollen or bee products should exercise caution and consult a healthcare professional before consuming bee pollen. Bee pollen can potentially trigger allergic reactions in susceptible individuals. Q: How Should Bee Pollen Be Stored? A: Fresh bee pollen should be stored in a well-sealed container in the refrigerator or freezer to maintain its freshness and nutrient content. Dried bee pollen should be stored in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Q: Does Bee Pollen Help With Allergy Relief? Bee pollen is often considered a potential natural remedy for alleviating allergy symptoms. It is purported to desensitize the body to allergens. [(Special Discount) Purchase The Best Bee Pollen Supplement For The Lowest Prices Here!!](https://becomingtrendy.com/best-bee-pollen-brand) The news and editorial staff of the Times-Standard had no role in this postâ€™s preparation. This is a paid advertisement and does not necessarily reflect the official policy or position of the Times-Standard, its employees, or subsidiaries.

author: financialcontent.com
title: Kenâ€™s Hardwood Barbecue, Trinity Missionary Baptist Church, and Sigma Pi Phi Fraternity Unite to Celebrate Christmas Through Acts of Kindness | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
Tucson, AZ, USA - December 29, 2023 - In the spirit of Christmas, a day renowned for its traditions of giving and sharing, Ken's Hardwood Barbecue, in partnership with Trinity Missionary Baptist Church and Sigma Pi Phi Fraternity, is reaffirming its commitment to service to others.
Ken Alexander, the driving force behind this heartwarming collaboration, shares, "On a day known for giving, we feel service to others is the best way for us to celebrate Christmas."
As the holiday season approaches, Ken's Hardwood Barbecue, Trinity Missionary Baptist Church, and Sigma Pi Phi Fraternity joins hands for the fifth consecutive year to extend a helping hand to the hungry and unhoused in the Tucson area. On Christmas Day, they convene at Santa Rita Park to provide a hot, delicious meal, free of charge, to those in need.
The Big Red Mobile Kitchen, symbolizing the unity of these organizations, will be on-site to serve and share the warmth of the season with the community. This annual event embodies the true spirit of Christmas by bringing nourishment and a sense of community to individuals who may be facing hardship during the holiday season.
This commitment to selfless service has a rich history deeply rooted in the heart of Ken's family. In 2000, Ken Alexander's mother initiated a program in Jeffersonville, IN, known as the King's Table, dedicated to feeding the hungry and unhoused in the community. This remarkable program, born out of compassion and love for the community, continues to serve its residents to this day.
For more information about Ken's Hardwood Barbecue or to explore its menu, visit www.kenshardwoodbbq.com or email catering@kenshardwoodbbq.com or call (520) 745-4746. (5250 E 22nd Street, Tucson, AZ 85711)
About Ken's Hardwood Barbecue
Ken's Hardwood Barbecue is a family-owned, award winning restaurant in Tucson, AZ, renowned for its unique blend of Southern comfort cuisine and expertly smoked meats. Drawing from four generations of culinary passion, the restaurant is a testament to the deep-seated traditions of Kentucky and Tennessee. With a commitment to authenticity and quality, Ken's Hardwood Barbecue continues to enthrall its patrons with mouthwatering dishes that speak of a rich heritage.
 Zondra TV Network
Contact Person: Zondra Evans
Email: Send Email
Phone: 469-712-7168
 //zondratv.com

author: Andrew Robson
title: Rain and snow alert across Tayside and Fife days after Storm Gerrit
text:
Perth & Kinross Warning for MORE rain and snow across Tayside and Fife just days after Storm Gerrit The Met Office warning comes with flood alerts already in place.
By Andrew Robson December 29 2023, 11.38am Share Warning for MORE rain and snow across Tayside and Fife just days after Storm Gerrit //www.thecourier.co.uk/fp/news/perth-kinross/4853009/snow-rain-warning-tayside-angus/ Copy Link 0 comment A car wades through a flooded road in Perthshire. Image: Kenny Smith/DC Thomson
Residents across Tayside and Fife are facing a fresh weather warning of rain and snow just days after Storm Gerrit battered the region.
The alert covers large parts of Scotland, including Angus, Dundee, Perth and Kinross and northern Fife.
The warning says a period of sleet and snow turning to rain is expected to bring disruption, with a chance of power cuts, travel delays and flooding.
It comes as many areas were flooded on Wednesday after the extreme rainfall brought by Storm Gerrit.
The alert covers large parts of Scotland on Saturday. Image: Met Office The Met Office warning , which runs from 8am till midnight on Saturday, says heavy rain is expected on lower ground with a period of snow across higher ground.
It reads: â€œSnow accumulations are expected largely above 250-300m, where 5-10 cm may accumulate.
â€œAt lower levels mostly rain is expected with 15-25 mm.
â€œAlthough some snow accumulations may occur for a time over northwestern areas, with perhaps 1 to 3 cm in places.â€
Fresh warning days after Storm Gerrit Sepa flood alerts remain in place across the region as rainfall is expected to fall on saturated ground.
Slessor Gardens was soaked by the heavy rain during Storm Gerrit. Image: Chris Ferguson The weather warning comes just days after heavy rain and gale-force winds caused chaos across Tayside and Fife.
Residents in Cupar had to be evacuated from their homes on Wednesday as roads were submerged by floodwater.
High winds toppled trees in Dundee, major roads were closed and a train crashed into a tree in Broughty Ferry .

author: Jon Heath
title: NFL news: Russell Wilson â€˜likesâ€™ tweets after being benched by Broncos
text:
The Denver Broncos benched quarterback Russell Wilson on Wednesday, a move that will protect the team from having to pay the quarterback future salary thatâ€™s guaranteed for injury.
Had Wilson suffered a serious injury in one of the teamâ€™s final two games of the 2023 season, $37 million of his 2025 salary would become locked in. Broncos coach Sean Payton insisted Wednesday that he made the decision in an effort to win , but multiple outlets have reported that the benching was financially motivated.
Wilson has not publicly spoken to the media since his benching, but he â€œlikedâ€ a series of tweets on Twitter/X that suggest Denver benched him for financial reasons, not his performance.
In todayâ€™s age of social media, â€œlikingâ€ the tweets is just as revealing of a statement as a literal statement from the quarterback. Wilson clearly seems to be endorsing/confirming the story that the Broncos threatened to bench him if he did not adjust his contract.
Wilson â€œlikedâ€ the following tweets on Wednesday:
Russell wilson has the seven ties passer rating in the nfl, 26 passing TDs which ties him with Tua and Mahomes (with fewer INTS than either), and leads the NFL in 4th quarter comebacks and game winning drives.
There's no marrative from me bud. Just facts. https://t.co/eFQJXOuKx6
â€” Benjamin Allbright (@AllbrightNFL) December 27, 2023
ð”ððƒð€ð“ð„: The #Broncos threatened to bench Russell Wilson weeks ago if he didnâ€™t remove his injury guarantees, per @Schultz_Report
Russell Wilsonâ€™s benching by the Broncos today is solely financially related and has been in the works for weeks.
The Broncos approachedâ€¦ https://t.co/ez4iBwOiZY pic.twitter.com/WkM6hILc04
â€” Dov Kleiman (@NFL_DovKleiman) December 27, 2023
Russell Wilson is now getting BENCHED despite outplaying some of the leagues biggest â€œstarsâ€
Wilson 2023:
Passing TDs: 26
INTs: 8
Yards/Attempt: 6.9
Rushing TDs: 3
Mahomes 2023:
Passing TDs: 26
INTs: 14
Yards/Attempt: 6.9
Rushing TDs: 0
Make it make senseâ€¦ pic.twitter.com/UPxfJEjK4G
â€” Fantasy Fanatics (@FFB_Fanatics) December 27, 2023
. @Schultz_Report joins us to give us exclusive insight on what led to the benching of Russell Wilson. pic.twitter.com/6tIN46z7Bv
â€” Speak (@SpeakOnFS1) December 27, 2023
If the Broncos would've beat the Patriots last week, would Russ still be benched today? ðŸ‘€ @Schultz_Report weighs in pic.twitter.com/FByoY9f8e1
â€” Speak (@SpeakOnFS1) December 27, 2023
Russell Wilson might be getting cut this offseason but this was still one of the best throws of the season
pic.twitter.com/9QPngJWLVK
â€” Kevin (@Daboys_22) December 28, 2023
Wilson also wrote a message on his Twitter/X page: â€œGodâ€™s got me. Looking forward to whatâ€™s next.â€
Godâ€™s got me.
Looking forward to whatâ€™s next.
â€” Russell Wilson (@DangeRussWilson) December 28, 2023
Wilson then â€˜likedâ€™ Robert Griffin IIIâ€™s response to the QBâ€™s tweet.
Mad respect for how you have handled this entire situation @DangeRussWilson
When you were disrespected, you still showed respect. When you were threatened, you led your team to wins. When you were torn down, you kept building up your guys and never wavered. Godâ€™s got your back. https://t.co/XnpDd00MvG pic.twitter.com/lnl3ooTiWi
â€” Robert Griffin III (@RGIII) December 28, 2023
Former teammate Geno Smith, who ended up replacing Wilson in Seattle, also tweeted a message of support for the quarterback:
FREE 3
â€” Geno (@GenoSmith3) December 27, 2023
Wilson, 35, seems unlikely to play again for the Broncos after being benched this week. Denver will have until March 17 to make a decision â€” after that deadline, Wilson will have $37 million become guaranteed for the 2025 season.

author: Bill Galluccio
title: Lost Girl Approaches 'Law & Order' Star During TV Shoot To Ask For Help | 97.9 WJLB
text:
Photo: GC Images
Law & Order: Special Victims Unit star Mariska Hargitay was mistaken for a real cop while filming an episode of the show in New York City on April 10. Hargitay has been playing Detective Olivia Benson on the show for the past 25 years, the longest run of any character on a prime-time drama series.
During a break in filming, a young girl wandered onto the set at Anne Loftus Playground in Fort Tryon Park and walked right up to Hargitay , ignoring the film crew and her scene partner Ice-T .
The girl believed that Hargitay was an actual police officer and asked her for help finding her mother.
According to TMZ , Hargitay didn't miss a beat and immediately began to help the girl . Filming was held up for about 20 minutes as the cast and crew searched the park for the girl's mother, who was relieved when the two were reunited.
Law & Order: Special Victims Unit was recently green-lit for a 26th season, extending its reign as the longest-running prime-time drama series of all time.
Photo: GC Images
